com.jxc.controller

类 UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jxc.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/user")
@Scope(value="prototype")
@SessionAttributes(value="userPage")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
